title: Sentiment Compass Input
description: Configuration for the Sentiment Compass analysis actor.

source_dataset_id.title: Source Dataset
source_dataset_id.description: Select the dataset from an upstream actor (e.g., Topic Trend Aggregator) to be analyzed.

max_topics_to_process.title: Max Topics to Process
max_topics_to_process.description: Maximum number of topics to analyze from the source dataset.

max_entities_to_analyze.title: Max Entities per Topic
max_entities_to_analyze.description: Maximum number of top entities (by mentions) to analyze for specific sentiment within each topic.
